data.name: Investment Cost Basis
data.description:
THIS IS NOT TO BE USED FOR ACTUAL INVESTING DECISIONS. TALK TO A FINANCIAL ADVISOR BEFORE INVESTING.

If you are into investing, something that comes up is when to buy?

As the old saying goes, buy low and sell high. Much easier said than done.
In this world I would like to feed you information and get a recommendation on if I should buy.

Update "shouldIBuy" so that when given the number of shares already owned, the total amount it cost to buy those shares previously and the current price a true or false is returned. If the current price is less than (exclusive) the average cost per share then, return true.
